import React, { useState } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { Button, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' function SearchBrews() { const [abv, setAbv] = useState('') function handleFood() { console.log('food') } function handleAbv(e) { const abvSearch = e.target.value fetch(`https://api.punkapi.com/v2/beers?${abvSearch}&per_page=5`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((beers) => setAbv(beers)) } return (
{abv.name} Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
) } export default SearchBrews
